title: Are Ariana Grande's parents divorced? - Quora

response.answer_text: I went to her Wikipedia page and it said her mother’s name is Joan Grande and her fathers name is Edward Butera. She has an older half brother called Frankie Grande through Joan.  Above: Photo of Ariana and Frankie. In regards to are her parents divorced, Wikipedia says the following: “Grande's family moved from New York to Florida when her mother was pregnant with her, and her parents separated when she was around 9 or 10 years old.“ So from that I’d say yes, they’re no longer together.
Yes, unfortunately Ariana’s parents are divorced, but they still meet and have family time together.
